sentences.en: A novel laser confocal biochip scanner was given in this paper.
sentences.cn: 本文提出了一种新颖的激光共焦生物芯片扫描仪.

sentences.en: But first they have to decode the scanner's algorithm.
sentences.cn: 但是他们首先要破解感应器的运算规则.

sentences.en: Import your scanned images from the scanner and save as a JPG file.
sentences.cn: 从扫描仪导入扫描后的图像，并保存为JPG文件。

sentences.en: Power Switch: Use this to turn the scanner ON or OFF.
sentences.cn: 扫描仪电源开关: 使用这个开关来开启或关闭此扫描仪的电源.

sentences.en: The identity cards are examined by an electronic scanner.
sentences.cn: 用电子扫描器来检验身份证。

sentences.en: The image - dissector scanner is another heavily used and very successful low light level detector.
sentences.cn: 析象管扫描器是另一种常用而且很成功的微光探测器.

sentences.en: The invisible infrared spectrum is also sensed by the multispectral scanner.
sentences.cn: 看不见的红外光谱也能被多光谱扫描器辨出.

sentences.en: The New 3 D Optical Desktop Scanner affordable for all!
sentences.cn: 新的三维光学扫描仪桌面就是要让所有人都买得起!

sentences.en: The scanner calibration variables including brightness , contrast, gamma value, the white balance.
sentences.cn: 扫描仪需订正的不恒度次要包罗亮度 、 差比度(伽马值) 、 不黑不均.

sentences.en: The scanner is sometimes called a lexical analyzer.
sentences.cn: 扫描程序有时又把它称为词法分析程序.

sentences.en: The scanner will save risk and pain for patients.
sentences.cn: 扫描仪将使病人免遭风险和痛苦。

sentences.en: The syntax analyzer calls the scanner when it needs a new symbol.
sentences.cn: 当语法分析程序需要新符号时,它就调用扫描过程.

sentences.en: Using a scanner, we can look at the unborn foetus.
sentences.cn: 我们用扫描器可以观察未出生的胎儿.

sentences.en: We will fix the laser scanner on the engraving machine.
sentences.cn: 将激光扫描测头安装在雕刻机上.

sentences.en: You should know the significance to the scanner.
sentences.cn: 你应该知道垂向扫描器的意义.

words.tran_cn: 扫描的；观测的；搜索的；扫掠的
扫描；浏览；细看；详细调查；标出格律
[计][电子]扫描仪；扫描器；光电子扫描装置

phrases.tran_cn: 电脑断层扫描机（等于CAT scanner）

trans.tran_cn: 扫描器，扫描设备，检测装置，细查者
trans.tran_en: a machine that passes an electrical beam over something in order to produce a picture of what is inside it
